Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. For you, this product is valued at $120. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $140. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
